mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, matchMakerRank, rank, tier ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{matchMakerRank}, #{rank}, #{tier})
mapper.select: SELECT id, matchMakerRank, rank, tier FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, matchMakerRank, rank, tier FROM user
SELECT id, matchMakerRank, rank, tier FROM user ORDER BY rank LIMIT 10
SELECT id, matchMakerRank, rank, tier FROM user WHERE rank BETWEEN #{rank}-#{interval} AND #{rank}+#{interval} ORDER BY rank
